sentences.sentence: Vacuolar compartmentalization appears to be the source of tolerance of metal_accumulating plants.
sentences.translation: 金属离子在液泡中的区域化分布是植物耐重金属的主要原因。

sentences.sentence: Workspaces can also be linked together in Networks, allowing easier compartmentalization and coordination on a per-project basis.
sentences.translation: 用户也可通过网络将协作空间连接起来，以对每个项目来做区分和协作。

sentences.sentence: This compartmentalization makes it easy to update these third-party tools, which don't necessarily require changes to Eclipse itself.
sentences.translation: 这种划分方式使得这些第三方工具易于更新，而不一定要求改变Eclipse本身。
